title: kabootle
author: kabootle
content: KABOOTLE.COM- The Future Of Crypto Exchange!!! 🔥                                    🔥 PRIVATE SALE IS ON 🔥🏆 Kabootle.com represents the state-of-the-art of hybrid exchanges, by combining the best features of CEX and DEX. 🏆🔥 1. Launch on BSC Mainnet     2. Private sale for 15 days only started on 31st August 2022!! hurry!!     3. Smart contract security audited.     4.Pre-sale for 20 days      5. Buy using Debit/Credit Cards --- Coming soon     6. Buy directly using BNB wallet and enjoy low gas fee!     7.  Buy using our KBT Dapp (Trust wallet/Metamask)     8. Launch on PinkSale -- Coming soon 🔥🏆$KBT Tokens 🏆 Buy KBT Tokens now to enjoy the discounted prices and make 2-3X profits from the start.Socials: WEBSITE | MEDIUM | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK🔥 Steps to buy using Trust wallet/Metamask Step 1: Open trust wallet/metamask app and go to browser Step 2: Paste this url in the browser;https://www.kbt.kabootle.comStep 3: on the top left make sure to select the BNB Smart Chain as the network.Step 4: Click on Connect Wallet and finally enter the amount of tokens you wish to buy and confirm the purchase. Note; You will receive the tokens automatically once it’s launched publicly. No action required from your end. 🔥
